products.name: Sauvage
products.description: An iconic fragrance from Dior, Sauvage combines bold and fresh scents for the modern man.

products.name: My Way
products.description: The new feminine fragrance from Giorgio Armani, MY WAY invites you to broaden your horizons.

products.name: Bleu De Chanel
products.description: A timeless fragrance from Chanel, Bleu De Chanel represents confidence and sophistication.

products.name: Le Lion
products.description: Chanel Le Lion is a luxurious fragrance that evokes strength and elegance.

products.name: The Scent
products.description: Hugo Boss The Scent is a warm, seductive fragrance perfect for special occasions.

products.name: Paris
products.description: First Class Paris offers a sophisticated and refreshing scent, inspired by the elegance of Parisian life.

products.name: Minera
products.description: Mint Minera features a cool and revitalizing scent, perfect for everyday wear and casual occasions.

products.name: Classic
products.description: Kahf Classic is a timeless fragrance with a rich and earthy scent, embodying a sense of tradition.

products.name: Blue
products.description: Gatsby Blue is a vibrant and energizing fragrance, designed for the modern and confident individual.

products.name: Casual Man
products.description: Romeo Casual Man delivers a fresh and relaxed scent, ideal for laid-back and comfortable moments.
